message.content: {"id": "47910", "title": "Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF", "description": "When using the ajc sourceroots <mydir outjar <my.jar command, an output file is created with a .jar extension. However, the resulting file is not a valid jar file because it does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file.", "OB": "The ajc outjar command should create a valid jar file with the MANIFEST.MF file included.", "EB": "The output file created by the ajc outjar command does not include the required MANIFEST.MF file, making it an invalid jar file.", "SR": "To fix this issue, the ajc outjar command needs to include the MANIFEST.MF file in the generated jarfile."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '47910', 'title': 'Bug 47910ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF', 'description': 'with a METAINF/MANIFEST.MFfile inside. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'I call ajc sourceroots <mydir outjar <my.jar and an output file is createdwith a .jar extension, but it is not a valid jar file because there is noMANIFEST.MF file. '}
